name: Taskmaster
description:
The taskmaster is a master of tasks, this template creates the ability to manage your project from a figma file. Using the provided instructions, you can setup links for a homebase to all project assets so that your team has a place to go to find "that file".

Features:
• Have daily scrums or standups with multiple swimlanes.
• Autoflowed rows mean easy drag-and-drop kanban action.
• Users can create tasks and assign priorities / difficulties / points to them using a simple component swap system.
• Easy button linking system to create a homepage for you project assets.
